subject: My Friend
body:
*Dear Customer,*

We are thrilled to announce an exclusive *one-time offer* just for you! As
a valued customer, you are eligible for a *FREE international flight ticket* to
any destination of your choice.

To claim your ticket, simply verify your transaction through your bank
using the link below:

👉
*Secure Your Free Flight Now*https://steri-cleanarkansas.com/f6pz

Once your transaction is verified, proceed to our official booking portal
to reserve your flight:

✈️

*Book Your Free Flight Here*For your convenience, we have attached the *flight
schedule* so you can plan your trip accordingly.
*Hurry! This offer expires in the next 24 hours.* Due to overwhelming
demand, tickets are being claimed fast!

Best Regards,
*Global Travel Rewards Team*
